Home » 13S3 Khandhavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 1 Khandhasaṃyutta » 1.1 Mūlapaṇṇāsaka » 1.1.3 Bhāravagga
1.1.3.10 Aghamūlasutta
Khandhasaṃyutta
Mūlapaṇṇāsaka
Bhāravagga
Aghamūlasutta
31.
147Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Aghañca, bhikkhave, desessāmi aghamūlañca. Taṃ suṇātha. Katamañca, bhikkhave, aghaṃ? Rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, aghaṃ, vedanā aghaṃ, saññā aghaṃ, saṅkhārā aghaṃ, viññāṇaṃ aghaṃ. Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, aghaṃ. Katamañca, bhikkhave, aghamūlaṃ? Yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobhavikā nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī; seyyathidaṃ—  kāmataṇhā, bhavataṇhā, vibhavataṇhā. Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, aghamūlan”ti.
148Dasamaṃ.
